title: Home Repair Solutions
shortDescription: Expert repairs for common household issues including drywall, doors, windows, and general maintenance tasks.

title: Interior Painting Services
shortDescription: Professional interior painting with quality materials and attention to detail for lasting results.

title: Carpentry & Woodwork
shortDescription: Custom carpentry projects including built-ins, shelving, trim work, and furniture assembly.

title: Electrical Repairs
shortDescription: Safe electrical work including outlet installation, fixture replacement, and basic wiring updates.

title: Plumbing Fixes
shortDescription: Reliable plumbing services for leaks, clogs, fixture installation, and minor pipe repairs.

title: Drywall & Patching
shortDescription: Seamless drywall repair, patching, and texturing to restore walls to like-new condition.

title: Tile Installation
shortDescription: Professional tile work for bathrooms, kitchens, and floors with precision and quality craftsmanship.

title: Deck & Fence Services
shortDescription: Deck construction, repair, and fence installation to enhance your outdoor living space.
